House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00071
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING A TWO THOUSAND PESO (P2,000.00) ACROSS-THE-BOARD INCREASE IN THE MONTHLY PENSION WITH CORRESPONDING ADJUSTMENT OF THE MINIMUM MONTHLY PENSION UNDER THE SOCIAL SECURITY SYSTEM, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 12 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 1161, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ‘SOCIAL SECURITY ACT OF 1997’
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Maceda (029 2016-09-29)2. Savellano (029 2016-09-29)
REMARKS: Increases the current Social Security System (SSS) monthly pension by Two Thousand Pesos (P2,000.00) across-the-board to our pensioners, not only to help them meet their basic needs and financial obligations but also to reward them for their contribution to our country’s development.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Measure approved by the Committee on 2016-09-07
      2. Committee Report approved on 2016-11-15
      3. on 2016-12-07
          -Approval of Committee Report substituting House Bills proposing P2,000 monthly increase in SSS pension with HJR
      4. Other Action by the Committee on Rules on 2016-12-07
          -HJR 0010 filed
MOTHER BILL: HJR0010
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2016-07-26
